TEXT.S: Luan Qerimi htuw squw 1929 neng 10 gat 15 nici', ruw 87 kawas qnxan niya'. hiya' qaniy ga sinmung baq balay pgeki' na squliq. yaquw squliq qsahuy geki' na Hamlet binrwan niy Shakespeare quw spgeki' niya', ruw kya cikay geki' na Arpaniya' uziy quw wal niya' skhopa' lalu' uziy. ruw pira' uziy pin'ega' uziy, mingluw kalay pcbaq sa p'ega' uziy.
